item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and nearby.

This week's location is:
SBC, the new one in Hamden! their site

I'm excited to try this new bar/restaurant. It's in Hamden but not far over the border so I hope a lot of you will rsvp to attend. We will be in a private room near the bar.


Food and Drink Specials:
Pabst $2.50 all evening for NHC!
Maybe more tbd once we're there, courtesy of Matt, the manager
Their own beers are $4.50 a pint, and I'll try at least one, or maybe a sampler...

Your contact for this event is:
Karen (KBS) 203.535.8751

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD
item.name: 3/3 Happy Hour at SBC!
